snippet.title: Privacy protections for the new Bing Social Search ...‎
snippet.description: Yesterday on the Bing Community Blog, Microsoft announced a new integration with Facebook and Bing in a post titled, Facebook Friends Now Fueling Faster Decisions on Bing

snippet.title: TechCrunch and Facebook Federate: Privacy meltdown ...‎
snippet.description: Facebook and TechCrunch are in a relationship. You can now sign in using your Facebook account and use those credentials to leave comments on TC posts.
